cat: Railway stations in East Delhi district
infoPOI.description: The Akshardham (Hindi: अक्षरधाम) Metro Station is a Delhi Metro station operated by the Delhi Metro Rail Corporation Limited. The station lies between Pandav Nagar on one side and the Akshardham mandir and the Commonwealth Games Village on the other side. It was designed to be a complement of the Akshardham mandir located nearby. The station, which was completed on 12 November 2009, is the tallest metro station within the Delhi Metro system. The station serves commuters traveling to the mandir and provided transport for the 2010 Commonwealth Games.
